description: Linux system-monitor dashboard for Netdata-collected system-stats using InfluxDB

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "disk_util.utilization" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "disk" =~ /^$disk$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

panels.title: Writeback Memory & Memory Used by Kernel
Total IPv4 Traffic & Total IPv6 Traffic

targets.query: SELECT mean("value") FROM "system.ip.received" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

list.label: Host
list.name: host
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "system.cpu.system" WITH KEY = "host"

title: Netdata
